"how did it spend my last week? i was as usual since i am essentially retired at home most of the time, however i went to a church social on saturday evening, it was quite fun, it was a cultural night, i had representators of different cultures, representations of different cultures there, um, the prime non american culture was rep was the mong culture, um, we had a potluck meal a lot of delicious food, i brought lasagna, um, i served as missionary for our church, the church of jesus christ or laterday saints, about 40 years. go in italy, which is why i brought lanzania. i have been trying to diet, so i was, i restricted myself a little bit on what i ate, but not too much. sunday was uh standard church meetings from 9:30 to 11:30, an hour of separate meeting followed by an hour of sunday school, sacrament meeting because it was... the first sunday of the month comprised fast and testimony meeting - during which most members of the congregation had fasted for 24 hours or were in the middle of a 24-hour fast and as they felt prompted so to do went up to the front of the chapel to the podium and bore their testimony, gave their witnesses. of jesus christ and his gospel, uh, let's see, that meet anyone, if so, what did you talk about or do? i helped out, help teach a couple of lessons with the missionaries this past week, and met a man named james in his, i'd say late 20s, early 30s. we met him over at the church, walked through the meeting house, showing him its configuration, explaining what the various rooms were used for uh, the missionaries challenged him to prepare for baptism coming up on the 21st of this month, today being um tuesday the 9th of july. um hm, sorry i keep saying um, my favorite day last week, monday is frequently my favorite day and i think may have been i i am an addict, addicted to pornography and to sugar, and i am participating in an addiction recovery program via zoom meeting monday evenings. i always come away from those one-our meetings, uplifted, strengthened, and feeling happy, knowing that i am loved and accepted. this week was no exception, perhaps even more spiritual as when i shared, i related something that i had written in my journal about an answer to prayer, that's a memorable thing. it happened to me last week um as far as anything funny the sister missionaries live in the apartment above me and i sometimes will try to startle them when they come home in the evening. i did that once last week and got a very large reaction."
